scripts.clean-pj: rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock && rm -rf apps/classic/node_modules apps/classic/.expo && rm -rf apps/killer/node_modules
scripts.prod:all: yarn workspace classic prebuild && yarn workspace killer prebuild
scripts.prod:all:normal: yarn workspace classic prebuild:normal && yarn workspace killer prebuild:normal
scripts.prod:all:force: yarn workspace classic prebuild:force && yarn workspace killer prebuild:force
